full_summary:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a Divisional Physician to provide occupational health services to RCMP Members in ‘D’ Division, Manitoba. The successful candidate will work forty hours per week and be required to provide medical services for the site between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m., Monday through Friday.

The contract will be for a period of two years, with the option to extend the term by up to three additional one-year periods. The contract requires the contractor and all personnel/subcontractors to hold a valid “Top Secret” Security Clearance issued by the RCMP Departmental Security.

All bids must comply with the requirements of the solicitation document and meet the mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive. The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

The solicitation document includes the terms and conditions of the contract, as well as the evaluation criteria. It is the bidder’s responsibility to review the document in detail.

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys portal at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) by the closing date of February 9, 2023, at 3:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.

Please note that the contract is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. Bidders must ensure they comply with the Integrity Regime requirements at the time of submission.

In addition, the RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to bid on this contract. In accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses, the RCMP will give preference to eligible Indigenous businesses when evaluating bids.

For more information, please contact Sheena Simonson, Procurement Officer, at sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or 306-515-1563.

**Important dates:**

* Publication Date: January 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 9, 2023, at 3:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time

**Required Attachments:**
